Package io.github.georgiosgoniotakis.bluetoothwrapper.library.exceptions

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    BTDeviceNotFoundException
    This exception is thrown whenever a connection to a device that does not exist anymore, in the list of paired devices, takes place.
    BTSocketNotInitializedException
    Throws a RuntimeException in case that the BT socket inside the BTManager class cannot be initialized.
    NotValidBTMemberException
    This is a runtime exception which occurs whenever the developer tries to pass a class member which is not an instance of the BTReachable class to the BTExplorer.BTExplorer(BTReachable, Handler).
    NotValidHandlerException
    This is a runtime exception which occurs whenever the developer tries to pass a null Handler to the BTExplorer.getInstance(BTReachable, Handler)
